body: Fairly sure the ending is jjst a tease and will not actually turn into NTR but that is just purely my speculations based on the one long series of the author/artist but there is that isn't a vanilla but not really an NTR work of them but thats about it in my opinion the continuation is going to still be a vanilla.
The continuation looks scary for me
I feel this is one of those, that if I don't see what's next, it stays perfect in my mind. Thus is top tier and I won't even look at the next chapters.
Right. So, what do you think is the over/under of this series going NTR one or two books from here?
This is S teir doujin for me, better not turn into a ntr tho

Art is nice, those thicc lines make the manga even better and the plot is good
8/10

@below: Huh? But it has been the same TL team, and as far as the content goes, it's absolutely the same (I compared both versions, this one with #394780). Two things different: added "defloration" tag and last page TL credits they added another person to their 'Quality Control'.
